data.name: Ultra Space Battle Brawl - Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Aggression With Dignity!
Feel the beat and excitement of the most intense Intergalactic-Baseball-Fighting game in the universe through the Ultra Space Battle Brawl Original Soundtrack!
Featuring 28 tracks that will surely make your head nodding and your hips shaking.
Including an Opening Song composed by the legendary Manami Matsumae!

Accessing The DLC

After purchasing and downloading the Ultra Space Battle Brawl Original Soundtrack, you can access the content in the game's directory folder. Here are the steps to access the files:
  • Open up Steam and go to your Library tab
  • Right click on Ultra Space Battle Brawl and select Properties
  • In the Properties window, select Local Files tab and find the "Browse Local Files" button.
  • This will take you to the Ultra Space Battle Brawl game directory, which has the Original Soundtrack content included in it.
  • You can also enjoy it via your Steam Music Library

Track List:


Disc1

01 - USBB Opening Theme (Manami Matsumae)
02 - USBB Main Theme (Masdito Bachtiar)
03 - Story Prologue (Masdito Bachtiar)
04 - Next Opponent (Masdito Bachtiar)
05 - Character Select (Masdito Bachtiar)
06 - Djarwani Theme (Masdito Bachtiar)
07 - Nyammo Theme (Masdito Bachtiar)
08 - Akifu Theme (Masdito Bachtiar)
09 - Brodin Theme (Masdito Bachtiar)
10 - Dolah Theme (Masdito Bachtiar)
11 - Robin Theme (Masdito Bachtiar)
12 - Tumini Theme (Masdito Bachtiar)
13 - Budi Theme (Masdito Bachtiar)
14 - Yayuk Theme (Masdito Bachtiar)
15 - Donna Theme (Masdito Bachtiar)
16 - Raden Theme (Masdito Bachtiar)
17 - Story Epilogue (Masdito Bachtiar)

Disc 2

01 - Djarwani Theme - Chiptuned (Little-Sound Orchestra)
02 - Nyammo Them - Chiptuned (Little-Sound Orchestra)
03 - Akifu Theme - Chiptuned (Little-Sound Orchestra)
04 - Brodin Theme - Chiptuned (Little-Sound Orchestra)
05 - Dolah Theme - Chiptuned (Little-Sound Orchestra)
06 - Robin Theme - Chiptuned (Little-Sound Orchestra)
07 - Tumini Theme - Chiptuned (Little-Sound Orchestra)
08 - Budi Theme - Chiptuned (Little-Sound Orchestra)
09 - Yayuk Theme - Chiptuned (Little-Sound Orchestra)
10 - Donna Theme - Chiptuned (Little-Sound Orchestra)
11 - Raden Theme - Chiptuned (Little-Sound Orchestra)

data.supported_languages:
English*, Japanese, French, German, Arabic, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Thai
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core™ Duo or faster
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Shader Model 2.0 compatible
  • Storage: 220 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.5
  • Processor: Dual Core 1.6 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB display memory
  • Storage: 220 MB available space
